name: Justo, Inc
description: Operator of an online supermarket platform intended to provide doorstep delivery of food and other dairy products. The company's platform offers a wide range of fruits, vegetables, meat products, beauty products and house supplies, enabling customers to purchase healthy and fresh food products at affordable prices.
